unittitle_ssm: Thomas Stamm Papers
abstract_ssm: Thomas Stamm [1904-1980s] was a U.S. Trotskyist and one-time member of the Political Committee of the Workers Party who, along with Hugo Oehler, founded the Revolutionary Workers League. This small collection consists of one record box of material generated and collected by Thomas Stamm during the course of his personal research, writing, and involvement with the Revolutionary Workers League.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Revolutionary Workers League of the U.S.
